name: Hop to ESCAPE VELOCITY
description:
This game was inspired by Github Game Off 2019, and the source can be found at github.com/zmercedes/HTEV

In this game, your aim is to use the platforms to escape the planet. You are hopping on platforms which provide you with energy, and can use this energy to activate your booster to give yourself an extra oomph, but be careful! Falling below your traveled threshold will use your energy, and not having enough energy will cause you to crash!
